messages.email: Please provide a valid email address
messages.nameMax: Name must be at most 50 characters
messages.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters
messages.nameMin2: Name must be at least 2 characters
messages.newPasswordMin: New password must be at least 6 characters
messages.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters
messages.usernameMax: Username must be at most 30 characters
messages.usernameMin: Username must be at least 3 characters
messages.usernameRegex: Username must only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores
messages.usernameRegexSpecialChars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores (_) or hyphens (-), and cannot start or end with special characters

content.p1: This is a starting platform for full-stack projects with Next.js. It provides an efficient structure to build web applications using modern technologies. The key technologies powering the platform are:
content.p2: Whether you're building your first app or managing complex projects, this platform gives you the tools to get started quickly with minimal setup

nextjs.description: : for server-side rendering and full-stack development
